data.text: (WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!)
Alright then, Trainer, I'll be off!
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
Alright, for this Selection Race…… 
Ah, there she is, Copano Rickey.
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A

data.text:
Last time was "Turf", but this time she's participating on 
"Dirt"? What's her aptitude for it?
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer B

data.text:
Rickey……what's going on here? 
To think you'd suddenly challenge a dirt race.
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
Don't tell me! You plan on pushing Feng 
Shui on to me even on the course!?
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
That's not it! It's just something I 
decided on after talking with Trainer.
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
It's possible 『Dirt might be a better option』, they said. 
Things like form and physique, and also……
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
And above all, maybe dirt has better compatibility with Feng 
Shui. I won't know until I have a serious race, after all♪
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
Feng Shui's compatibility…… Rickey, don't take 
dirt lightly. Dirt is something that requires a 
steady accumulation of effort, day after day!
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
Rather than relying on charms, just like when you're tilling the 
earth in Hokkaido, if you don't do all you can, then victory will 
never come, you know?
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
I know. I've been working hard. 
And on top of that―
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text: As long as I can hear the "Voice of the Earth"……!
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
Copano Rickey focused and entered her gate. 
And then the gates of fate opened.

(Alright, off to a good start! The bracket number, color, 
and direction are all compatible. And the feel of the dirt……)
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
(Yeah, it's good! When I run seriously…… 
I can sense the condition of the track clearly!)
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
(But that's not the most important part. The problem is― 
whether I can hear the "Voice of the Earth" or not)
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
(If I can't feel the flow of qi, then my run 
won't be blessed with luck. Please, somehow―!)
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
(I need to take the course from further outside……! 
So I don't get hit by the dirt kicked up in front of me!)
data.name: Uma Musume A

data.text:
(Today it feels like my legs are being held back～ 
I need to stabilize my breathing and save my stamina……)
data.name: Uma Musume B

data.text:
(I can see it……! I can feel it……! The flow of qi. The Voice of 
the Earth……it's telling me how the race is developing)
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
(It's just like Trainer predicted. So that's how it was, 
Feng Shui has better compatibility with dirt!)
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
Rickey, compared to before, she's so lively…… 
Trainer-san, what happened……?
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text: Sand? By sand, you mean the dirt?
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
―Feng Shui is not something mystical, it's more like the study of 
environmental fortune. If that's true, then understading the 
conditions and location are important.

What conveyed that the most vividly was the "Sand". Whether it 
was the gravel on the grounds or the sand on the beach, dirt 
could show the flow of qi.

(Trainer! Yeah! Where should I take position? Da, 
Shin, Gon…… Alright, Shin! The qi is thin to the 
east, so I can run freely and pull away)
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
(The five elements are balanced! From the Wood comes Fire, and 
the Fire returns everything to Soil! The place I should press the 
attack is just beyond that tree)
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
(The last straight! 『Physical』, 『Spiritual』……all are in harmony. 
The fortunes are aligned. All that's left is―)
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
The fastest will win!! All the stamina I've been saving, I'll 
channel it and use everything I've got!! 
Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!!
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text: She's completely pulled ahead!? T-this run is……!!
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
What's going on, wasn't this completely different from before!? 
Did something happen!?
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer B

data.text:
Nothing happened. This is Copano Rickey's true strength. 
With proper preparation, and being able to see the 
flow of qi, this is how she can run.
And with this, the Selection Race was over―

Trainer, thank you. 
Because of you, I was able to have an awesome run☆
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
You were able to figure out the reason I couldn't 
hear the Voice of the Earth because you believed 
in Feng Shui, and thought about it!
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
And with that, I want to spread the wonder of Feng Shui's power, 
and make all those that are down and lost happy, but―
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
Will you lend me your strength? As my trainer! 
This time, you won't say No, right?
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
Alllllright! I was having a hard time finding someone, you see. 
Someone who believed in Feng Shui from the bottom of their heart, 
and wanted to make everyone happy☆
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
You and me are definitely 『In Harmony』! 
Meeting you has truly made me lucky and happy♪
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
Mumumu……I never thought Rickey would be able to handle dirt. 
But after seeing her run today……
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
Regardless of Feng Shui, she's definitely formidable……! 
But…… I won't lose!!
data.name: Hokko Tarumae

data.text:
Yes, yes, truly. 
Perhaps I should join in and play too.
data.name: Wonder Acute

data.text:
Tarumae! Acute-san! 
Yeah, looking forward to it♪
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text: I'll definitely use Feng Shui to make both of you happy☆
data.name: Copano Rickey

data.text:
And with these strong rivals, she would enter the dirt 
curriculum. Copano Rickey's Happy Road had begun!
